unnormalised:
Hain, onko arho inj-a' delivery ko bhul ket'a!
12B-a' badol-re 12A Gandhi Nagar ko kul ket'a, bhaggoy-te oṛa' pashi-a' bhaiyya inj-ay fon-a'din.
Pin code 560001, Bangalore-re arho besh sewa darkar-a'k'an-a!
normalised:
He he, inj-ak delivery do ko arho golmal keda!
Barah B badli re do, barah A Gandhi Nagar-te ko bhejaw keda, bhagya-te arap-pasi-ren bhaiyya do inj-do ko phone keda.
Pin code paanch chhoy shunyo shunyo shunyo ek, Bangalore-re do arho bes service darkar-a!
text:
Hain, onko arho inj-a' delivery ko bhul ket'a!
12B-a' badol-re 12A Gandhi Nagar ko kul ket'a, bhaggoy-te oṛa' pashi-a' bhaiyya inj-ay fon-a'din.
Pin code 560001, Bangalore-re arho besh sewa darkar-a'k'an-a!
